title: Which Kpop group has the least effective leader? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well I can’t say a specific name, however to me it’s somebody that just takes the role not goes up on it. Never be there for the members or give encouragement talks to the group. I never seen those qualities in a group before, however there is more leadership than others no doubt and sometimes they don’t know what to do to and that their just place with that role. It can be extra pressure for them and it’s not easy.
